Visualize nel tutorial di seguito i vari passi da seguire per finalizzare in pochi secondi la sincronizzazione di il tuo account Gmail:

validation.passwordmessage: Length between 8 and 16 characters. At least: 1 uppercase (A-Z), 1 lowercase (a-z), 1 number (0-9) and 1 special character ( !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\]^_`{|}~)

error.failed: Incorrect user or password. Try again.
error.blocked:
We have blocked your Oliverlist account due to more than 3 failed login attempts.

Please email us at contact@oliverlist.com so that we can reestablish your account and can continue working normally.

Don't worry, your information and campaigns will keep working. We have only blocked access for security reasons.
error.expired: Your session has expired, please log in again.
